greetings 

     Andreas

Andreas,
As you already opened another bug with similar exception (bug 151201), it sounds like there's something specific in your worskpace which causes troubles to Search Engine.

It would be really helpful that you try to retrieve a test case or provide your workspace to help me to understand what is the origin of your problem.

Offending classes come from /de.netalied.functionblock/bin/de/tif/jacob/rule (RulesetEditor.class for this bug and RulePlugin.class for bug 151201). This should help you to retrieve what kind of rename you were trying to do and built a simple test case, shouldn't it?

Thanks
